text: haey tohbeicha yeung nung bangheanh anak( mou ham meat)muoychamnuon ( nei tondakamm) del yeung sanyea champoh puokke ryyka yeung nung yokchivit robsa anak( moun kar kaetlaeng nouv tondakamm) pitmen kadaoy ka tuonati robsa anak kreante chea anak phsaapvophsaeay bonnaoh . rie kar chomnoumchomreah kuchea tuonati robsa yeung
